channel.title: Post Trump on WORLDWIDE GLOBAL
channel.description: Recent content in Post Trump on WORLDWIDE GLOBAL

item.title: state of terror and the reproduction of imprisoned dissent
item.description:
Amongst the many techniques suggested by Dr Schein were the following:

  1. physically remove the prisoner to an area sufficiently isolated in order to break or seriously weaken close emotional ties;
  2. segregate all natural leaders;
  3. prohibit group activities that do not fit brainwashing objectives;
  4. systematic withholding of mail;
  5. create a feeling amongst the isolated group of prisoners that they have been abandoned by and totally isolated from the community;
  6. undermine all emotional supports;
  7. preclude access to literature which does not aid in the brainwashing process.

item.title: posthuman bodies
item.description:
stable real whiteness vs. womb

Oh, they interrogated me once, so they know me. They’ll come here and let us go.
